headline: Wokester bloodbath: Blue San Francisco throws out three Board of Education leftists by monster margins
author: Monica Showalter
sentences: Chances are this election result, and others like this one, are going to be a signal to the leftist, progressive, and socialist Democrats that to survive in the November election, that they are going to have to collude with their media propagandists to make themselves and their political agenda during the run up to the November election, look to enough of the stupid voter class that they (the Democrats) are more conservative then the wimpy Republicans when it comes to the (Democrat) imposed COVID school related mandates and restrictive requirements.

San Francisco Democrats turned hard on three far-left Board of Education members who kept public schools on lockdown, focused on changing the names of storied old schools to wokester specifications, and told Asians to go to hell on merit-based admissions to the few remaining good ones.

The landslide decision means board President Gabriela López and members Alison Collins and Faauuga Moliga
